case.title: Color
case.description: The color of the form's background.

case.title: Use Bitmap
case.description: When checked, allows a bitmap image to be used as the form's background.

case.title: Display Mode
case.description: If Bitmap is checked, sets the way the bitmap is displayed: "Absolute" (actual size), "Stretch" (fill the background, with potentially unequal scaling in horizontal and vertical dimensions), or "Best Fit" (largest size without distortion of the image).

case.title: Embedded
case.description: The name of the embedded image.

case.title: File
case.description: The name of a bitmap image file to use as a background.

case.title: Library
case.description: The name of the library image.

case.title: Has Page Header
case.description: Indicates whether the letter has a page header. The page header is at the top of the page.

case.title: Has Page Footer
case.description: Indicates whether the letter has a page footer. The page footer is at the btoom of the page.

case.title: Has Letter Head
case.description: Indicates whether the letter has letter head. The letter head appears on the first page after the page header and before the letter.

case.title: Has Continuation Header
case.description: Indicates whether the letter has a continuation header. The continuation header appears on pages 2 onward after the page header and before the letter.

case.title: Has Continuation Footer
case.description: Indicates whether the letter has a continuation footer. The continuation footer appears on pages 2 onward after the letter and before the page footer./description>

case.title: Table
case.description: The name of the table providing the data.

case.title: Left, Right
case.description: Sets the left and right margins of the page.

case.title: Top, Bottom
case.description: Sets the top and bottom margins of the page.

case.title: Page Layout
case.description: Defines the orientation of the page. The options are "Portrait" and "Landscape".

case.title: Size
case.description: One of the standard paper sizes or "Custom". The selection of "Custom" enables the Width and Height fields.

case.title: If data does not fit
case.description: Indicates how to handle data that does not fit on a page. The options are: "Trim (do not print) overflow data", "Shrink data to fit on page", "Print overflow data on additional pages", and "Prompt at print time".

case.title: Printer
case.description: Indicates which printer to use. The options are: "Use Default Printer", and the printers listed under the Specify Printer list.

case.title: Paper bin
case.description: The paper sources defined for the selected printer.

case.title: Saved Properties
case.description: Enables the Properties button. The Properties button displays the standard Windows configuration dialog for the selected printer.

case.title: Print setup dialog
case.description: Indicates whether to display the Windows configuration dialog for the selected printer before the letter(s) print.

case.title: Print to file
case.description: Not used.

case.title: Order Expression
case.description: An expression that orders selected records.

case.title: Ascending / Descending
case.description: Indicates whether to accept the order expression as written (Ascending) or to invert it (Descending).

case.title: Filter Expression
case.description: An expression that selects records from the table or set.

case.title: Select
case.description: Provides an additional level of filtering. The options are: "All", "Marked" (records), and "Unmarked" (records).

case.title: Addition Record Order and Filter criteria
case.description: Provides an additional level of filtering and ordering. The options are "None", "Base report on current selection of records", and "Prompt for criteria at run time".

case.title: Use filter/order from Query
case.description: The Use filter/order from Query button displays a dialog that allows the operator to select an existing query. The filter and order expressions from the query overwrite the Order Expression and Filter Expression fields.

section.title: Region Properties
section.description: The region settings vary for each of the five regions defined on the Letter tab.

case.title: Height
case.description: The height of the region in inches.

case.title: Keep together on page
case.description: Indicates whether the region must be moved to the next page if it all cannot fit on the current page.

case.title: Justify to bottom of page
case.description: Indicates whether to expand the region to fill to the bottom of the current page.

case.title: Shrink contents of band
case.description: Indicates whether it is acceptable to shrink the region to make it fit on a page.

case.title: Left, Top
case.description: Sets the left and top coordinates of the window.

case.title: Width, Height
case.description: Sets the width and height dimensions of the window.

case.title: Mode and Value
case.description: If the mode of any of the Position or Size values is set to "Percentage", then the value is interpreted as a percentage of the Alpha Anywhere window. In all other cases, the values are in inches. If the mode of any of the Position or Size values is set to "Percentage", then the property setting is then "Percent". If the mode is set to "Inches" or "Cm", the value of the property setting is then "Absolute". If the mode is set to "Default, the value of the property setting is "Default". In this case the size of the form is set by the size of the form in the design window. If the mode is set to "Use Form Width" or "Use Form Height", the value of the property setting is "Form". In this case the size of the form is set by the size of the design window.

case.title: Sizeable
case.description: When checked, the user can resize the form window.

case.title: System Menu
case.description: When checked, there is a system menu in the upper left corner of the form window.

case.title: Minimize Button
case.description: When checked, there is a minimize button in the upper right corner of the form window.

case.title: Maximize Button
case.description: When checked, there is a maximize button in the upper right corner of the form window.

case.title: Has Caption
case.description: When checked, the caption field is enabled.

case.title: Caption
case.description: The name of the form.

case.title: Frame Style
case.description: Sets the style of the window to "Form" (modeless), "Dialog" (modal), or "Tool" (?).

case.title: View Menu
case.description: The standard menu to display.

case.title: View Toolbar
case.description: The standard toolbar to display.
